description.ko: 경직된 기하학적 질서가 혼돈스러운 글리치 미학에 의해 산산조각 나는 디지털 붕괴의 시각적 표현입니다.
description.en: A visual representation of digital collapse, where rigid geometric order is shattered by chaotic glitch aesthetics.

prompt: A massive, brutalist #1A1A1A obsidian monolith suspended in a stark #FFFFFF digital void, caught in a perpetual state of geometric disintegration. The structure fractures into a torrent of sharp #808080 shards and vertical #C0C0C0 scanline glitches. High-contrast cinematic lighting with razor-sharp shadows and raytraced reflections on the fragmented black glass. 8k, Octane Render, emphasizing chaos within order and the monochrome complexity of a collapsing digital reality.
